data.snippet: # techandbusiness.org. techandbusiness.org is a podcast/newsletter founded by Leo Duarte & Pierce Berke. ### Where can I find podcast stats for techandbusiness.org? Rephonic provides a wide range of podcast stats for techandbusiness.org. See how many people listen to techandbusiness.organd access YouTube viewership numbers, download stats, audience demographics, chart rankings, ratings, reviews and more. ### How many listeners does techandbusiness.org get? View further listenership figures for techandbusiness.org, including podcast download numbers and subscriber numbers, so you can make better decisions about which podcasts to sponsor or be a guest on. ### What are the audience demographics for techandbusiness.org? Rephonic provides comprehensive predictive audience data for techandbusiness.org, including gender skew, age, country, political leaning, income, professions, education level, and interests. ### How many episodes of techandbusiness.org are there? ### How do I contact techandbusiness.org? Rephonic pulls ratings and reviews for techandbusiness.orgfrom multiple sources, including Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Castbox, and Podcast Addict. ### How do I access podcast episode transcripts for techandbusiness.org? Rephonic provides full transcripts for episodes of techandbusiness.org.

data.snippet: VS Code Insiders Podcast  In this episode James sits down with Ben and Peng from the VS Code team to unpack a year of AI evolution inside the editor — from Copilot Free to the new agent sessions UI.
